latest_reviews.reviewBody: I get plans for projects that are originally done on A4 paper. This paper is sturdy and has a nice finish.

latest_reviews.reviewTitle: Great product. Shipping was fast and packaged well.
latest_reviews.reviewBody: Since I work with many European companies I have to use A4 paper for recording their correspondence.

I am just getting started on making books and this paper is really nice! I decided on this size rather than the 8.5x11 so I could get a nicer half-book page size. The quality is superb and I wish it was easier to get here in the states.

latest_reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for crafting in CM for work outside the US.
latest_reviews.reviewBody: A size of paper that is used primarily outside of the USA, this is the perfect paper size for drawing and pattern work outside of the US.Shipping was timely and arrived undamaged. Thank you!

Like the US imperial system, the letter size is pretty much only used in North America. I had to purchased A4 size for some documents i needed to submit outside of the US. Double A is the staple brand Im used to and trust.Just note that this is A4 which is 8.27" x 11.69" (21cm x 29.7cm) vs US letter size 8.5" x 11" (21.6cm x 27.9cm). So A4 is narrower but longer than the US letter.
Realmente valió la pena. Aunque llegó dañado el empaque, las hojas están bien, pasa muy bien en mi impresora y queda perfecto para lo que necesito. Volveré a comprar más adelante UwU
çok beğendim kaliteli tok bir kağıt .
